Package com.github.cwilper.bigtrouble

Provides simplified access to Cassandra clusters, including direct support for reading and writing large files.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Connection A single-threaded connection to a Cassandra node or cluster.
RecordFunction Callback interface to do something with a record.
 

Class Summary
ConnectionConfig Configuration for node or cluster connections.
NodeConnection A connection to a single node in a Cassandra cluster.
 

Enum Summary
Consistency Tunable consistency settings for read and write operations in the cluster.
ReplicationStrategy Specifies how replicas are distributed among nodes.
 

Exception Summary
LoginException Signals a failure to authenticate or authorize when attempting to connect to a node.
 

Package com.github.cwilper.bigtrouble Description

Provides simplified access to Cassandra clusters, including direct support for reading and writing large files.
